title: Ethics Committee launches investigation into Rep. Katie Hill
text:
The House Ethics Committee announced it has launched an investigation into Rep. Katie Hill following allegations she engaged in an improper sexual relationship with a congressional staffer — in what would be a violation of House rules.

The California Democrat denied the allegations in a statement to POLITICO on Tuesday, and blamed the controversy on an “abusive husband” whom she is in the midst of divorcing.

Story Continued Below

Hill is among the most high-profile freshman Democrats — serving as a freshman representative in leadership and as vice chair of the Oversight Committee — and is a sharp critic of President Donald Trump.
